rule2.name: Invalid XML against schema
rule2.message: XML document is invalid against the schema.

rule3.name: Duplicated project name
rule3.message: The following project name was used in the submitted projects more than one time. Please provide unique project name.

rule4.name: Duplicated project title and description
rule4.message: Both project title and description are duplicated with the submitted projects. Duplicated project should not be submitted.

rule5.name: Identical project title and description
rule5.message: Project title and description are identical. Please provide more detailed description.

rule6.name: Short project description
rule6.message: Project description is too short. Description text must be more than 100 characters.

rule7.name: Empty description for other relevance
rule7.message: Text description for the Relevance 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of the Relevance 'Other'.

rule8.name: Empty description for other subtype
rule8.message: Text description for the subtype 'Other' is not provided. Please provide DescriptionSubtypeOther.

rule9.name: Empty target description for other sample_scope
rule9.message: Text description for the sample_scope 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of target.

rule10.name: Empty target description for other material
rule10.message: Text description for the material 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of target.

rule11.name: Empty target description for other capture
rule11.message: Text description for the capture 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of target.

rule12.name: Empty method description for other method_type
rule12.message: Text description for the method_type 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of method.

rule13.name: Empty data description for other data_type
rule13.message: Text description for the data_type 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of data.

rule14.name: Invalid publication identifier
rule14.message: Invalid publication identifier, enter valid pubmed id, pmc id or DOI.

rule15.name: Empty publication reference
rule15.message: Publication reference is not provided. Please provide reference in free-text when id is not available.

rule16.name: Invalid umbrella project
rule16.message: Invalid project is selected as an umbrella project. Please select a valid umbrella project.

rule17.name: Missing strain/isolate/cultivar
rule17.message: At least one of strain/isolate/cultivar is required for monoisolate organism.

rule18.name: Taxonomy at species or infraspecific rank
rule18.message: Taxonomy should be species or infraspecific level.

rule19.name: Empty organism description for multi-species
rule19.message: Organism description is required when sample scope is multi-species.

rule20.name: Metagenome or environmental
rule20.message: When sample_scope is "Environment", taxonomy must be a metagenome where lineage starts with unclassified sequences and scientific name ends with 'metagenome'.

rule21.name: Invalid locus tag prefix
rule21.message: Locus tag prefix and DDBJ BioSample accession pair is invalid.

rule22.name: Invalid BioSample accession
rule22.message: Invalid BioSample accession. Please provide a valid BioSample accession with format SAMD\d+

rule37.name: Multiple projects
rule37.message: Only one project is allowed in BioProject XML

rule38.name: Taxonomy name and id not match
rule38.message: Organism and taxonomy id do not match.

rule39.name: Taxonomy error warning
rule39.message: Submission processing may be delayed due to necessary curator review. Please check spelling of organism, current information generated the following error message and will require a taxonomy consult.

rule41.name: Invalid locus tag prefix format
rule41.message: Locus tag prefix must be 3-12 alphanumeric characters and the first character may not be a digit.
